DESCRIPTION: Card becomes #yJammed. #yJammed cards have no effect when played and then #yUnjam. #yStatus, #yCurse, and #yUnplayable cards cannot be #yJammed.
This card has no effect when played, then #yUnjams.
When a creature reaches #b20 #yBlight it loses #b50 HP and then loses #b20 #yBlight.
#yUnplayable. Plays itself when drawn, #yExhausts itself, then draws #b1 card.
#yDowngrading a card removes #b1 upgrade from it. Unupgraded cards cannot be #yDowngraded.
